title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5302.1 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5302.1 - Definition

State Regulations

Unless the context indicates otherwise, gaming
position
means: (a) each
player position at a slot machine; (b) each player position at an electronic
table game; and
(c) each table
game. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5302.1

Adopted

New

York State Register April 10, 2019/Volume XLI, Issue 15, eff. 4/10/2019

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
